title: Distel?
content:
This typeface is Distel,

Are there any font like it? Also any tips on Irish feeling fonts (that are readable)?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [irish.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804074834/http:/typophile.com/files/irish.jpg) | 40.05 KB |
author: Pattie P

comments.content:
If you are looking for Uncial forms search out anything by Victor Hammer, either K G Hoefer or Gottfried Pott (cannot remember which one did the Uncial) and or G G Lange (Solemnis).

That should get you started. There are some ill informed ones on MyFonts, but these guys are the best place to start.

Michael

Isn't it a lovely font?

Thanks I'll check those fonts out.
